name: Akroma, Angel of Wrath
text: Flying, first strike, vigilance, trample, haste, protection from black and from red
flavor: "No rest. No mercy. No matter what."

name: Akroma's Devoted
text: Cleric creatures have vigilance.
flavor: Akroma asked for only one thing from her troops: unwavering, unconditional loyalty.

name: Aven Redeemer
text: Flying\n{T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
flavor: Redeemers rise with the sun, and the spirits of the people rise with them.

name: Aven Warhawk
text: Amplify 1 (As this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each Bird and/or Soldier card you reveal in your hand.)\nFlying

name: Beacon of Destiny
text: {T}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, that damage is dealt to Beacon of Destiny instead.
flavor: "We all borrowed life from the Ancestor to exist in this world. Today, I repay that debt."

name: Celestial Gatekeeper
text: Flying\nWhen Celestial Gatekeeper dies, exile it, then return up to two target Bird and/or Cleric permanent cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.

name: Cloudreach Cavalry
text: As long as you control a Bird, Cloudreach Cavalry gets +2/+2 and has flying.
flavor: "It's easy to lose sight of hope until you gaze out from my vantage point."

name: Daru Mender
text: Morph {W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)\nWhen Daru Mender is turned face up, regenerate target creature.

name: Daru Sanctifier
text: Morph {1}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)\nWhen Daru Sanctifier is turned face up, destroy target enchantment.

name: Daru Stinger
text: Amplify 1 (As this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each  Soldier card you reveal in your hand.)\n{T}: Daru Stinger deals damage equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on it to target attacking or blocking creature.

name: Defender of the Order
text: Morph {W}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)\nWhen Defender of the Order is turned face up, creatures you control get +0/+2 until end of turn.

name: Deftblade Elite
text: Provoke (Whenever this creature attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)\n{1}{W}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by Deftblade Elite this turn.

name: Essence Sliver
text: Whenever a Sliver deals damage, its controller gains that much life.
flavor: The slivers would survive, even at the expense of every other creature on Otaria.

name: Gempalm Avenger
text: Cycling {2}{W} ({2}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)\nWhen you cycle Gempalm Avenger, Soldier creatures get +1/+1 and gain first strike until end of turn.

name: Glowrider
text: Noncreature spells cost {1} more to cast.
flavor: "It is not yet time."

name: Liege of the Axe
text: Vigilance\nMorph {1}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)\nWhen Liege of the Axe is turned face up, untap it.

name: Lowland Tracker
text: First strike\nProvoke (Whenever this creature attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)
flavor: "I feed my hatred to the righteous and they join my crusade."\n—Akroma, angelic avenger

name: Planar Guide
text: {3}{W}, Exile Planar Guide: Exile all creatures. At the beginning of the next end step, return those cards to the battlefield under their owners' control.
flavor: "Every moment has its own savior."

name: Plated Sliver
text: All Sliver creatures get +0/+1.
flavor: Overcoming extinction has only made the slivers more determined to live.

name: Starlight Invoker
text: {7}{W}: You gain 5 life.
flavor: The Mirari glows in her eyes.

name: Stoic Champion
text: Whenever a player cycles a card, Stoic Champion gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: His outer calm belies his inner fury.

name: Sunstrike Legionnaire
text: Sunstrike Legionnaire doesn't untap during your untap step.\nWhenever another creature enters the battlefield, untap Sunstrike Legionnaire.\n{T}: Tap target creature with converted mana cost 3 or less.

name: Swooping Talon
text: Flying\n{1}: Swooping Talon loses flying until end of turn.\nProvoke (Whenever this creature attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)

name: Wall of Hope
text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)\nWhenever Wall of Hope is dealt damage, you gain that much life.
flavor: "What cage would you rather be inside of than out?"\n—Daru riddle

name: Ward Sliver
text: As Ward Sliver enters the battlefield, choose a color.\nAll Slivers have protection from the chosen color.
flavor: The first wave of slivers perished from the Riptide wizards' magic. The second wave shrugged off their spells like water.

name: Whipgrass Entangler
text: {1}{W}: Until end of turn, target creature gains "This creature can't attack or block unless its controller pays {1} for each Cleric on the battlefield."
flavor: "Now that I have your attention, perhaps I can tell you of the Order."

name: White Knight
text: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)\nProtection from black (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything black.)
flavor: In the wretched depths of the Grand Coliseum, his soul shines like a single torch blazing in the night.

name: Windborn Muse
text: Flying\nCreatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature he or she controls that's attacking you.
flavor: "Her voice is justice, clear and relentless."\n—Akroma, angelic avenger

name: Wingbeat Warrior
text: Flying\nMorph {2}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)\nWhen Wingbeat Warrior is turned face up, target creature gains first strike until end of turn.

name: Aven Envoy
text: Flying
flavor: Their grieving faces tell far more than a list of casualties ever could.

name: Cephalid Pathmage
text: Cephalid Pathmage can't be blocked.\n{T}, Sacrifice Cephalid Pathmage: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.
flavor: Pathmages can open doors that aren't even there.

name: Chromeshell Crab
text: Morph {4}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)\nWhen Chromeshell Crab is turned face up, you may exchange control of target creature you control and target creature an opponent controls.

name: Covert Operative
text: Covert Operative can't be blocked.
flavor: Some spies seek clarity. Others seek transparency.

name: Crookclaw Elder
text: Flying\nTap two untapped Birds you control: Draw a card.\nTap two untapped Wizards you control: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

name: Dermoplasm
text: Flying\nMorph {2}{U}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)\nWhen Dermoplasm is turned face up, you may put a creature card with a morph ability from your hand onto the battlefield face up. If you do, return Dermoplasm to its owner's hand.

name: Dreamborn Muse
text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard, where X is the number of cards in his or her hand.
flavor: "Her voice is insight, piercing and true."\n—Ixidor, reality sculptor

name: Echo Tracer
text: Morph {2}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)\nWhen Echo Tracer is turned face up, return target creature to its owner's hand.

name: Fugitive Wizard
flavor: Many wizards came to the Riptide Project hoping to return home with answers. Most, however, wouldn't return home at all.

name: Gempalm Sorcerer
text: Cycling {2}{U} ({2}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)\nWhen you cycle Gempalm Sorcerer, Wizard creatures gain flying until end of turn.

name: Glintwing Invoker
text: {7}{U}: Glintwing Invoker gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn.
flavor: The Mirari flares in his mind.

name: Keeneye Aven
text: Flying\nCycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: "I have no need of a map. The very continent itself guides my way."

name: Keeper of the Nine Gales
text: Flying\n{T}, Tap two untapped Birds you control: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
flavor: "You cannot fight the storm."

name: Master of the Veil
text: Morph {2}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)\nWhen Master of the Veil is turned face up, you may turn target creature with a morph ability face down.

name: Merchant of Secrets
text: When Merchant of Secrets enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor: To scrape out a living in Aphetto, wizards are reduced to selling rumors, lies, forgeries, or—if they get desperate enough—the truth.

name: Mistform Seaswift
text: Flying\n{1}: Mistform Seaswift becomes the creature type of your choice until end of turn.\nMorph {1}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

name: Mistform Sliver
text: All Slivers have "{1}: This permanent becomes the creature type of your choice in addition to its other types until end of turn."
flavor: Taking the form of a junior researcher, the first sliver slipped out of Riptide.

name: Mistform Ultimus
text: Mistform Ultimus is every creature type (even if this card isn't on the battlefield).
flavor: It may wear your face, but its mind is its own.

name: Mistform Wakecaster
text: Flying\n{1}: Mistform Wakecaster becomes the creature type of your choice until end of turn.\n{2}{U}{U}, {T}: Choose a creature type. Each creature you control becomes that type until end of turn.

name: Primoc Escapee
text: Flying\nCycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: Though a completely artificial species, primocs are a natural fit for the skies of Otaria.

name: Riptide Director
text: {2}{U}{U}, {T}: Draw a card for each Wizard you control.
flavor: Those who lead others to wisdom become the wisest themselves.

name: Riptide Mangler
text: {1}{U}: Change Riptide Mangler's base power to target creature's power. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
flavor: It wants you to be its chum.

name: Shifting Sliver
text: Slivers can't be blocked except by Slivers.
flavor: Once the last few slivers the Riptide Project controlled were dead, there was nothing to keep the island from being completely overrun.

name: Synapse Sliver
text: Whenever a Sliver deals combat damage to a player, its controller may draw a card.
flavor: "Species XR17 feeds upon the mental energies of its victims. This explains why the goblins remain unaffected."\n—Riptide Project researcher

name: Voidmage Apprentice
text: Morph {2}{U}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)\nWhen Voidmage Apprentice is turned face up, counter target spell.

name: Wall of Deceit
text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)\n{3}: Turn Wall of Deceit face down.\nMorph {U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

name: Warped Researcher
text: Whenever a player cycles a card, Warped Researcher gains flying and shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
flavor: New insights yield new senses.

name: Weaver of Lies
text: Morph {4}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)\nWhen Weaver of Lies is turned face up, turn any number of target creatures with morph abilities other than Weaver of Lies face down.

name: Willbender
text: Morph {1}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)\nWhen Willbender is turned face up, change the target of target spell or ability with a single target.

name: Aphetto Exterminator
text: Morph {3}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)\nWhen Aphetto Exterminator is turned face up, target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.

name: Bane of the Living
text: Morph {X}{B}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)\nWhen Bane of the Living is turned face up, all creatures get -X/-X until end of turn.

name: Blood Celebrant
text: {B}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
flavor: "Their blood is the nectar that nourishes the Cabal."\n—Phage the Untouchable

name: Corpse Harvester
text: {1}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Search your library for a Zombie card and a Swamp card, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

name: Crypt Sliver
text: All Slivers have "{T}: Regenerate target Sliver."
flavor: "Death couldn't contain the slivers. What made us think we could?"\n—Riptide Project researcher

name: Dark Supplicant
text: {T}, Sacrifice three Clerics: Search your graveyard, hand, and/or library for a card named Scion of Darkness and put it onto the battlefield. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.
flavor: Cabal clerics serve two masters: their patriarch and their god.

name: Deathmark Prelate
text: {2}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice a Zombie: Destroy target non-Zombie creature. It can't be regenerated. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
flavor: Death is a secret he is willing to share.

name: Drinker of Sorrow
text: Drinker of Sorrow can't block.\nWhenever Drinker of Sorrow deals combat damage, sacrifice a permanent.
flavor: It strikes at your soul, heedless of your prayers.

name: Dripping Dead
text: Dripping Dead can't block.\nWhenever Dripping Dead deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor: It oozes death from every pore.

name: Earthblighter
text: {2}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Destroy target land.
flavor: "A single dedicated mind can bring about the greatest destruction. That, or goblins—goblins work too."

name: Embalmed Brawler
text: Amplify 1 (As this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each Zombie card you reveal in your hand.)\nWhenever Embalmed Brawler attacks or blocks, you lose 1 life for each +1/+1 counter on it.

name: Gempalm Polluter
text: Cycling {B}{B} ({B}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)\nWhen you cycle Gempalm Polluter, you may have target player lose life equal to the number of Zombies on the battlefield.

name: Ghastly Remains
text: Amplify 1 (As this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each Zombie card you reveal in your hand.)\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, if Ghastly Remains is in your graveyard, you may pay {B}{B}{B}. If you do, return Ghastly Remains to your hand.

name: Goblin Turncoat
text: Sacrifice a Goblin: Regenerate Goblin Turncoat.
flavor: "Goblins won't betray their own kind for any price. They'll do it for a very specific price."\n—Phage the Untouchable

name: Graveborn Muse
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of Zombies you control.
flavor: "Her voice is damnation, unyielding and certain."\n—Phage the Untouchable

name: Havoc Demon
text: Flying\nWhen Havoc Demon dies, all creatures get -5/-5 until end of turn.
flavor: A cry of pain as it enters this world. A chorus of screams as it leaves.

name: Hollow Specter
text: Flying\nWhenever Hollow Specter deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {X}. If you do, that player reveals X cards from his or her hand and you choose one of them. That player discards that card.

name: Infernal Caretaker
text: Morph {3}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)\nWhen Infernal Caretaker is turned face up, return all Zombie cards from all graveyards to their owners' hands.

name: Noxious Ghoul
text: Whenever Noxious Ghoul or another Zombie enters the battlefield, all non-Zombie creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: Plague and death wrapped in one convenient package.

name: Phage the Untouchable
text: When Phage the Untouchable enters the battlefield, if you didn't cast it from your hand, you lose the game.\nWhenever Phage deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.\nWhenever Phage deals combat damage to a player, that player loses the game.

name: Scion of Darkness
text: Trample\nWhenever Scion of Darkness deals combat damage to a player, you may put target creature card from that player's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.\nCycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Skinthinner
text: Morph {3}{B}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)\nWhen Skinthinner is turned face up, destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

name: Smokespew Invoker
text: {7}{B}: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
flavor: The Mirari festers in its flesh.

name: Sootfeather Flock
text: Flying\nMorph {3}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
flavor: They pick at the remains of the city's corpse.

name: Spectral Sliver
text: All Sliver creatures have "{2}: This creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn."
flavor: "Sure, I've seen agents of the Cabal here and there. Well, not here, and certainly not in any of the sliver labs. Oh dear, I've said too much."\n—Apprentice researcher

name: Toxin Sliver
text: Whenever a Sliver deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor: It doesn't need to use its venom—it just needs you to know it can.

name: Vile Deacon
text: Whenever Vile Deacon attacks, it gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of Clerics on the battlefield.
flavor: "The Cabal and the Order really aren't that different. After all, we are both empowered by faith."

name: Withered Wretch
text: {1}: Exile target card from a graveyard.
flavor: Once it consecrated the dead. Now it desecrates them.

name: Zombie Brute
text: Amplify 1 (As this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each Zombie card you reveal in your hand.)\nTrample
flavor: Measure its determination by the screams of its prey.

name: Blade Sliver
text: All Sliver creatures get +1/+0.
flavor: After breaking free from the Riptide Project, the slivers quickly adapted to life on Otaria—much to the dismay of life on Otaria.

name: Bloodstoke Howler
text: Morph {6}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)\nWhen Bloodstoke Howler is turned face up, Beast creatures you control get +3/+0 until end of turn.

name: Clickslither
text: Haste\nSacrifice a Goblin: Clickslither gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor: The least popular goblins get the outer caves.

name: Crested Craghorn
text: Haste\nProvoke (Whenever this creature attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)
flavor: "Craghorns experience a wide range of emotions: rage, fury, anger . . ."\n—Foothill guide

name: Flamewave Invoker
text: {7}{R}: Flamewave Invoker deals 5 damage to target player.
flavor: The Mirari burns in his heart.

name: Frenetic Raptor
text: Beasts can't block.
flavor: "How do you stop a raptor from charging? No, seriously Help"\n—Blarg, goblin jester

name: Gempalm Incinerator
text: Cycling {1}{R} ({1}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)\nWhen you cycle Gempalm Incinerator, you may have it deal X damage to target creature, where X is the number of Goblins on the battlefield.

name: Goblin Assassin
text: Whenever Goblin Assassin or another Goblin enters the battlefield, each player flips a coin. Each player whose coin comes up tails sacrifices a creature.
flavor: The more victims he kills, the more likely he is to get the right one.

name: Goblin Clearcutter
text: {T}, Sacrifice a Forest: Add three mana in any combination of {R} and/or {G} to your mana pool.
flavor: "Did you know that wood burns even better than rocks?"\n—Toggo, goblin weaponsmith

name: Goblin Dynamo
text: {T}: Goblin Dynamo deals 1 damage to target creature or player.\n{X}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Goblin Dynamo: Goblin Dynamo deals X damage to target creature or player.

name: Goblin Firebug
text: When Goblin Firebug leaves the battlefield, sacrifice a land.
flavor: Most goblins leave behind a wake of destruction. A few goblins take one with them.

name: Goblin Goon
text: Goblin Goon can't attack unless you control more creatures than defending player.\nGoblin Goon can't block unless you control more creatures than attacking player.
flavor: Giant-sized body. Goblin-sized brain.

name: Goblin Grappler
text: Provoke (Whenever this creature attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)
flavor: Daru soldiers learned it's better to have a clean death from a sharp blade than to tangle with a goblin's rusted chains.

name: Goblin Lookout
text: {T}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Goblin creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: "Throw rocks at 'em! Throw spears at 'em! Throw Furt at 'em!"

name: Hunter Sliver
text: All Sliver creatures have provoke. (Whenever a Sliver attacks, its controller may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)
flavor: Once they get the scent, there is no escape.

name: Imperial Hellkite
text: Flying\nMorph {6}{R}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)\nWhen Imperial Hellkite is turned face up, you may search your library for a Dragon card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

name: Kilnmouth Dragon
text: Amplify 3 (As this creature enters the battlefield, put three +1/+1 counters on it for each Dragon card you reveal in your hand.)\nFlying\n{T}: Kilnmouth Dragon deals damage equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on it to target creature or player.

name: Lavaborn Muse
text: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has two or fewer cards in hand, Lavaborn Muse deals 3 damage to him or her.
flavor: "Her voice is disaster, painful and final."\n—Matoc, lavamancer

name: Macetail Hystrodon
text: First strike, haste\nCycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: The goblins tracked the hystrodon with much stealth and cunning. Then they were eaten with much pain and yelling.

name: Magma Sliver
text: All Slivers have "{T}: Target Sliver creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of Slivers on the battlefield."
flavor: As malleable as molten steel, but as dangerous as the finished blade.

name: Ridgetop Raptor
text: Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
flavor: "The Skirk Ridge has many wonderful things to discover—like escape routes."\n—Foothill guide

name: Rockshard Elemental
text: Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)\nMorph {4}{R}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

name: Shaleskin Plower
text: Morph {4}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)\nWhen Shaleskin Plower is turned face up, destroy target land.

name: Skirk Alarmist
text: Haste\n{T}: Turn target face-down creature you control face up. At the beginning of the next end step, sacrifice it.
flavor: "I treat each day as your last."

name: Skirk Drill Sergeant
text: Whenever Skirk Drill Sergeant or another Goblin dies, you may pay {2}{R}. If you do, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a Goblin permanent card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard.
flavor: "I order you to volunteer."

name: Skirk Marauder
text: Morph {2}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)\nWhen Skirk Marauder is turned face up, it deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

name: Skirk Outrider
text: As long as you control a Beast, Skirk Outrider gets +2/+2 and has trample.
flavor: Once the goblins thought about it, they preferred being atop a slateback to being in front of, behind, or underneath one.

name: Unstable Hulk
text: Morph {3}{R}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)\nWhen Unstable Hulk is turned face up, it gets +6/+6 and gains trample until end of turn. You skip your next turn.

name: Warbreak Trumpeter
text: Morph {X}{X}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)\nWhen Warbreak Trumpeter is turned face up, put X 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield.

name: Berserk Murlodont
text: Whenever a Beast becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.
flavor: "The harder we press forward, the harder Krosa pushes us back."\n—Aven scout

name: Branchsnap Lorian
text: Trample\nMorph {G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
flavor: Lorians treat trees and prey the same way: by ripping them limb from limb.

name: Brontotherium
text: Trample\nProvoke (Whenever this creature attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)
flavor: Lucky victims get run over. Unlucky victims get run through.

name: Brood Sliver
text: Whenever a Sliver deals combat damage to a player, its controller may put a 1/1 colorless Sliver creature token onto the battlefield.
flavor: Within weeks, more slivers nested in Otaria than ever existed on Rath.

name: Caller of the Claw
text: Flash\nWhen Caller of the Claw enters the battlefield, put a 2/2 green Bear creature token onto the battlefield for each nontoken creature put into your graveyard from the battlefield this turn.

name: Canopy Crawler
text: Amplify 1 (As this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each Beast card you reveal in your hand.)\n{T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each +1/+1 counter on Canopy Crawler.

name: Defiant Elf
text: Trample
flavor: "I lost one home when Yavimaya was destroyed. I will not lose another."

name: Elvish Soultiller
text: When Elvish Soultiller dies, choose a creature type. Shuffle all creature cards of that type from your graveyard into your library.
flavor: Mutated elves wondered if this was their final form, or if it was just another step.

name: Enormous Baloth
flavor: Its diet consists of fruits, plants, small woodland animals, large woodland animals, woodlands, fruit groves, fruit farmers, and small cities.

name: Feral Throwback
text: Amplify 2 (As this creature enters the battlefield, put two +1/+1 counters on it for each Beast card you reveal in your hand.)\nProvoke (Whenever this creature attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)

name: Gempalm Strider
text: Cycling {2}{G}{G} ({2}{G}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)\nWhen you cycle Gempalm Strider, Elf creatures get +2/+2 until end of turn.

name: Glowering Rogon
text: Amplify 1 (As this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each Beast card you reveal in your hand.)
flavor: A herd of one.

name: Hundroog
text: Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: "New links are being added to the food chain on a daily basis."\n—Riptide Project researcher

name: Krosan Cloudscraper
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Krosan Cloudscraper unless you pay {G}{G}.\nMorph {7}{G}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

name: Krosan Vorine
text: Provoke (Whenever this creature attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)\nKrosan Vorine can't be blocked by more than one creature.

name: Nantuko Vigilante
text: Morph {1}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)\nWhen Nantuko Vigilante is turned face up, destroy target artifact or enchantment.

name: Needleshot Gourna
text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor: The first aven scout squad returned from Krosa with disturbing stories. The second returned with disturbing casualties.

name: Patron of the Wild
text: Morph {2}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)\nWhen Patron of the Wild is turned face up, target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

name: Primal Whisperer
text: Primal Whisperer gets +2/+2 for each face-down creature on the battlefield.\nMorph {3}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

name: Quick Sliver
text: Flash\nAny player may play Sliver cards as though they had flash.
flavor: The directors of the Riptide Project wanted instant results on the sliver experiments. They got their wish.

name: Root Sliver
text: Root Sliver can't be countered.\nSliver spells can't be countered by spells or abilities.
flavor: "It would take another apocalypse to stop the slivers now."\n—Riptide Project researcher

name: Seedborn Muse
text: Untap all permanents you control during each other player's untap step.
flavor: "Her voice is wilderness, savage and pure."\n—Kamahl, druid acolyte

name: Stonewood Invoker
text: {7}{G}: Stonewood Invoker gets +5/+5 until end of turn.
flavor: The Mirari pulses in his veins.

name: Timberwatch Elf
text: {T}: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of Elves on the battlefield.
flavor: Even through the Mirari's voice, the elves still hear the call of their kinship.

name: Totem Speaker
text: Whenever a Beast enters the battlefield, you may gain 3 life.
flavor: "Elves and beasts are tied together, and I am the knot that binds them."

name: Tribal Forcemage
text: Morph {1}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)\nWhen Tribal Forcemage is turned face up, creatures of the creature type of your choice get +2/+2 and gain trample until end of turn.

name: Vexing Beetle
text: Vexing Beetle can't be countered.\nVexing Beetle gets +3/+3 as long as no opponent controls a creature.
flavor: As the Mirari's mutating effects grew out of control, centaurs and druids fled—but insects swarmed closer.

name: Wirewood Channeler
text: {T}: Add X mana of any one color to your mana pool, where X is the number of Elves on the battlefield.
flavor: "Your words are meaningless. The rustling of leaves is the only language that makes any sense."

name: Wirewood Hivemaster
text: Whenever another nontoken Elf enters the battlefield, you may put a 1/1 green Insect creature token onto the battlefield.
flavor: "Most insects have been drawn to the Mirari. But all that remain in Wirewood are under my care."
